Parties_Involved: ERGO Versicherung AG, the insured individual
Board_Members: Dr. Clemens Muth (Chairman of the Supervisory Board), Mathias Scheuber (Chairman of the Board), Dr. Christian Gründl, Christian Molt, Andrea Mondry, Heiko Stüber
Effective_Date: The insurance begins on the date specified in the application, provided that the first premium is paid promptly after it becomes due, as per clause 7.1 of the ERGO Schutzbrief Insurance Terms and Conditions.
End_Date: The contract can be terminated by either party with three months’ notice to the end of the agreed contract term.
Services_Provided: The insurance covers breakdown, accident or theft of the insured vehicle, illness, injury or death of an insured person, loss of certain items, unforeseen travel interruptions, emergencies or criminal prosecution abroad.
Insured_Persons: The insured individual and any additional insured persons specified in the contract.
Membership_Costs: The total premium amount, including statutory insurance tax and the desired payment method, can be found in the application.
Contract_Cancellation: The contract can be canceled with three months’ notice to the end of the agreed contract term. Both the insured and the insurer can terminate the insurance protection at any time in the event of an insured event.
Claims_Procedure: The insured person must report the claim to ERGO Versicherung AG as soon as possible.
Legal_Disputes: The jurisdiction for claims arising from the insurance contract is governed by clause 11 of the ERGO Schutzbrief Insurance Terms and Conditions.
extra.Governing_Law: The law of the Federal Republic of Germany applies to the initiation and execution of the contract.
